channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NBA star Steph Curry’s top parenting tip as a father of 4: ‘Learn what they respond to the most’
item.description: “You want to let them know that they each have a superpower and are unique for a reason.”

item.title: 'Not a valid excuse': Tensions mount over possible House committee on Mexican drug cartels
item.description: Rep. Dan Crenshaw and his allies are pushing House GOP leaders for a committee on Mexican drug cartels.

item.title: Gen Z Is The Most Conservative Generation In Decades Because They’re A Victim Of The Left’s Failures
item.description: The mystery is not that Gen Z is the 'most conservative generation in decades;' it is that Gen Z isn’t even more conservative.

item.title: With Each Injunction, The Courts Become An Unelected Ruling Class
item.description: This obstruction is far from what the framers intended.

item.title: More than 9 million student loan borrowers could see a big drop in their credit scores this year
item.description: "This would result in reduced credit limits, higher interest rates for new loans, and overall lower credit access," according to the Federal Reserve.

item.title: Trump: April tariffs on foreign goods might be 'lenient,' not equal retaliation
item.description: President Trump says his April tariffs on foreign goods will be "more lenient than reciprocal."

item.title: The Nondelegation Doctrine Returns to the Supreme Court
item.description: Can Congress give a private industry group an unlimited power to tax?

item.title: Hakeem Jeffries Counting On Leftist WI Supreme Court Candidate To Deliver House For Democrats
item.description: House Minority Leader says an 'enlightened Supreme Court' - aka a liberal-led court - could help Dems win back the House.

item.title: Securing the Seas Is Deeply American
item.description: Targeting the Houthis is not ‘bailing out Europe.’

item.title: An Indispensable Voice for Truth

item.title: Tesla analyst says CEO Elon Musk is ‘back in charge’ after surprise all-hands meeting, and investors are rewarding the company’s stock

item.title: Free Speech Does Not Guarantee Media Con Artists A Seat At Every Table
item.description: After AP said it would not use Gulf of America, why should it have a seat in the press room? AP suffered cause and effect, not censorship.

item.title: The recession could either speed up or slow down when you get your inheritance—experts say these are the huge deciding factors

item.title: Year of Shifting Sands: Reflections on the 2024 Global IPO Market

item.title: Book Review: Buffett’s Early Investments
item.description: This book digs into Buffett’s pre-Berkshire investments. The result is a fresh look into the origins of his investment approach.

item.title: The Alternative View: 401(k) Plans Are Better off Without Private Investments
item.description: The debate over the inclusion of private investments in 401(k) plans is a hot topic. Are DC plans better off without them?
